com.liukhtenko.ticket.dao.impl

Class TicketDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liukhtenko.ticket.dao.AbstractDao<java.lang.Long,Ticket>
      • com.liukhtenko.ticket.dao.impl.TicketDao

  • public class TicketDao
extends AbstractDao<java.lang.Long,Ticket>
    This class allows to make requests to the database and change the status or view tickets
    Version:
    1.25 02 Feb 2020
    Author:
    Vladimir Liukhtenko
